definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
(of a fragrance) to waft about/(fig.) (of foods) to become popular in other places as well
